text:
When i disable a thread group via GUI mode and i save the test plan, then 
closing jmeter and opening it again, the disable option is correctly saved and 
thread group is disabled in GUI mode , but not in command line mode.
creator: clebaudy@netfinca.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Agreed; the items were only being removed in Start.java, which is GUI only.

Updated Jmeter.java to remove the items from the tree before starting a non-
GUI run.

For some test plans, the change to JMeter.java causes a ConcurrentModification 
Exception.

So the fix needs to be revised. Re-opening the bug.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: This has been fixed, as far as I can tell. Please re-open if not.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text: *** Bug 26908 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
